channel.title: [Galkons] Client crashes when players hit over their current health
channel.description:
So, whenever someone is piled, uses overloads, or maybe gets destroyed by Jad at low hp it causes their client to crash with this error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 729 at Sprite.method349(Sprite.java:574) at Sprite.drawSprite(Sprite.java:401) at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:11968) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:12262) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10216) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11185) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:119) at client.run(client.java:6114) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
wat do

item.title: [Galkons] Client crashes when players hit over their current health

So, whenever someone is piled, uses overloads, or maybe gets destroyed by Jad at low hp it causes their client to crash with this error:
